name: The Arcade - Codeblocks '22
description:
"Hey guys, it's epicArcadeGamer69", back at it again with something... spooky. Yes today we're talking about the smash hit arcade game power surge. Or at least, it would be a hit game, if it ever came out! News articles about the game's 1981 release taut it as "legendary" and "the true rival to donkey kong", but despite the game's major appeal, it was never released to the public.

However, there is one cabinet known to exist, it's at an old retro place in Houston. I pretended to be interested in Pac-man or whatever the hell so I could snag the owner's keys and come back here later. Just another epic gamer moment, stealth 100 amirite?!? Anyways, time to finally try this arcade out, and see why it was mysteriously discontinued. This is epicArcadeGamer69, signing off. BE SURE TO SMASH THAT LIKE-"

CONTROLS

___________

WASD for movement

LMB to dim the arcade screen. Might be useful to see if anything's behind you. Just a PRO GAMER TIP FROM EPICARCADEGAMER69

collect all the batteries to ḙ̷͆s̴͚̃c̴̯͚͗á̸͓͜p̵̡̽e̵̮̥͛ ̷̞͕̊̂w̴̞̄͜͝ï̵̞t̸̪͌h̴̘̑ ̴͖́̋y̷̮̰̿͝ō̸̙̜ṳ̵̓͝ŕ̶̼̹ ̸̰́l̵̢͙̒̏i̴̲̽f̴̓̈ͅe̸̟͌
